long_description:
It then reshapes the z array into a 2D grid using the unique values of x and y.

The resulting 2D grid is used to create a Surface object with corresponding x, y, and z values.
short_description: The ORDERED_TRIPLE_2_SURFACE node takes an "OrderedTriple" instance of the DataContainer class that contains three arrays: x, y, and z.

parameters.name: default
parameters.description: The input OrderedTriple to which we apply the conversion to.

returns.description: The surface result from the conversion of the input.
